Package sorcer.launcher.process

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DestroyingListener  
    ExitingCallback
    Shutdown application by calling System.exit(0) when sorcerEnded is called
    ForkingLauncher  
    ProcessDestroyer
    Runnable that destroys all processes in a list passed in the constructor
